EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to approvers for request to Cease Licence or set Licence to Not Activated
EmailTemplate.name: PartnerInfo Cease or Not Activate Licence Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval required to cease or inactivate Licence {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please approve the request to have the following Licence Ceased or Not Activated {!Account.Name}.
To approve or reject this item, click this link {!Workitem.ID}
Or reply to this email with one of these words in the first line of the email message: APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, NO
regards,
